functionDecorators.name: batchCancelOrders
functionDecorators.description: Executes multiple calls of cancelOrder.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

functionDecorators.name: batchExecuteTransactions
functionDecorators.description: Executes a batch of Exchange method calls in the context of signer(s).

parameterDecorators.name: transactions
parameterDecorators.description: Array of 0x transaction structures.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Array of proofs that transactions have been signed by signer(s).

returnDecorators.name: returnData
returnDecorators.description: Array containing ABI encoded return data for each of the underlying Exchange function calls.

functionDecorators.name: batchFillOrKillOrders
functionDecorators.description: Executes multiple calls of fillOrKillOrder.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array of desired amounts of takerAsset to sell in orders.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been created by makers.

returnDecorators.name: fillResults
returnDecorators.description: Array of amounts filled and fees paid by makers and taker.

functionDecorators.name: batchFillOrders
functionDecorators.description: Executes multiple calls of fillOrder.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array of desired amounts of takerAsset to sell in orders.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been created by makers.

returnDecorators.name: fillResults
returnDecorators.description: Array of amounts filled and fees paid by makers and taker.

functionDecorators.name: batchFillOrdersNoThrow
functionDecorators.description: Executes multiple calls of fillOrder. If any fill reverts, the error is caught and ignored.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array of desired amounts of takerAsset to sell in orders.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been created by makers.

returnDecorators.name: fillResults
returnDecorators.description: Array of amounts filled and fees paid by makers and taker.

functionDecorators.name: batchMatchOrders
functionDecorators.description: Match complementary orders that have a profitable spread. Each order is filled at their respective price point, and the matcher receives a profit denominated in the left maker asset.

parameterDecorators.name: leftOrders
parameterDecorators.description: Set of orders with the same maker / taker asset.

parameterDecorators.name: rightOrders
parameterDecorators.description: Set of orders to match against `leftOrders`.

parameterDecorators.name: leftSignatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that left orders were created by the left makers.

parameterDecorators.name: rightSignatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that right orders were created by the right makers.

returnDecorators.name: batchMatchedFillResults
returnDecorators.description: Amounts filled and profit generated.

functionDecorators.name: batchMatchOrdersWithMaximalFill
functionDecorators.description: Match complementary orders that have a profitable spread. Each order is maximally filled at their respective price point, and the matcher receives a profit denominated in either the left maker asset, right maker asset, or a combination of both.

parameterDecorators.name: leftOrders
parameterDecorators.description: Set of orders with the same maker / taker asset.

parameterDecorators.name: rightOrders
parameterDecorators.description: Set of orders to match against `leftOrders`.

parameterDecorators.name: leftSignatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that left orders were created by the left makers.

parameterDecorators.name: rightSignatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that right orders were created by the right makers.

returnDecorators.name: batchMatchedFillResults
returnDecorators.description: Amounts filled and profit generated.

functionDecorators.name: cancelOrder
functionDecorators.description: After calling, the order can not be filled anymore.

parameterDecorators.name: order
parameterDecorators.description: Order struct containing order specifications.

functionDecorators.name: cancelOrdersUpTo
functionDecorators.description: Cancels all orders created by makerAddress with a salt less than or equal to the targetOrderEpoch and senderAddress equal to msg.sender (or null address if msg.sender == makerAddress).

parameterDecorators.name: targetOrderEpoch
parameterDecorators.description: Orders created with a salt less or equal to this value will be cancelled.

functionDecorators.name: executeTransaction
functionDecorators.description: Executes an Exchange method call in the context of signer.

parameterDecorators.name: transaction
parameterDecorators.description: 0x transaction structure.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that transaction has been signed by signer.

returnDecorators.name: returnData
returnDecorators.description: ABI encoded return data of the underlying Exchange function call.

functionDecorators.name: fillOrKillOrder
functionDecorators.description: Fills the input order. Reverts if exact `takerAssetFillAmount` not filled.

parameterDecorators.name: order
parameterDecorators.description: Order struct containing order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Desired amount of takerAsset to sell.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that order has been created by maker.

returnDecorators.name: fillResults
returnDecorators.description: Amounts filled and fees paid.

functionDecorators.name: fillOrder
functionDecorators.description: Fills the input order.

parameterDecorators.name: order
parameterDecorators.description: Order struct containing order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Desired amount of takerAsset to sell.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that order has been created by maker.

returnDecorators.name: fillResults
returnDecorators.description: Amounts filled and fees paid by maker and taker.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetProxy
functionDecorators.description: Gets an asset proxy.

parameterDecorators.name: assetProxyId
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the asset proxy.

returnDecorators.name: assetProxy
returnDecorators.description: The asset proxy address registered to assetProxyId. Returns 0x0 if no proxy is registered.

functionDecorators.name: getOrderInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets information about an order: status, hash, and amount filled.

parameterDecorators.name: order
parameterDecorators.description: Order to gather information on.

returnDecorators.name: orderInfo
returnDecorators.description: Information about the order and its state. See LibOrder.OrderInfo for a complete description.

functionDecorators.name: isValidHashSignature
functionDecorators.description: Verifies that a hash has been signed by the given signer.

parameterDecorators.name: hash
parameterDecorators.description: Any 32-byte hash.

parameterDecorators.name: signerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address that should have signed the given hash.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that the hash has been signed by signer.

returnDecorators.name: isValid
returnDecorators.description: `true` if the signature is valid for the given hash and signer.

functionDecorators.name: isValidOrderSignature
functionDecorators.description: Verifies that a signature for an order is valid.

parameterDecorators.name: order
parameterDecorators.description: The order.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that the order has been signed by signer.

returnDecorators.name: isValid
returnDecorators.description: `true` if the signature is valid for the given order and signer.

functionDecorators.name: isValidTransactionSignature
functionDecorators.description: Verifies that a signature for a transaction is valid.

parameterDecorators.name: transaction
parameterDecorators.description: The transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that the order has been signed by signer.

returnDecorators.name: isValid
returnDecorators.description: `true` if the signature is valid for the given transaction and signer.

functionDecorators.name: marketBuyOrdersFillOrKill
functionDecorators.description: Calls marketBuyOrdersNoThrow then reverts if < makerAssetFillAmount has been bought. NOTE: This function does not enforce that the makerAsset is the same for each order.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: makerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Minimum amount of makerAsset to buy.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been signed by makers.

returnDecorators.name: fillResults
returnDecorators.description: Amounts filled and fees paid by makers and taker.

functionDecorators.name: marketBuyOrdersNoThrow
functionDecorators.description: Executes multiple calls of fillOrder until total amount of makerAsset is bought by taker. If any fill reverts, the error is caught and ignored. NOTE: This function does not enforce that the makerAsset is the same for each order.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: makerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Desired amount of makerAsset to buy.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been signed by makers.

returnDecorators.name: fillResults
returnDecorators.description: Amounts filled and fees paid by makers and taker.

functionDecorators.name: marketSellOrdersFillOrKill
functionDecorators.description: Calls marketSellOrdersNoThrow then reverts if < takerAssetFillAmount has been sold. NOTE: This function does not enforce that the takerAsset is the same for each order.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Minimum amount of takerAsset to sell.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been signed by makers.

returnDecorators.name: fillResults
returnDecorators.description: Amounts filled and fees paid by makers and taker.

functionDecorators.name: marketSellOrdersNoThrow
functionDecorators.description: Executes multiple calls of fillOrder until total amount of takerAsset is sold by taker. If any fill reverts, the error is caught and ignored. NOTE: This function does not enforce that the takerAsset is the same for each order.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Desired amount of takerAsset to sell.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been signed by makers.

returnDecorators.name: fillResults
returnDecorators.description: Amounts filled and fees paid by makers and taker.

functionDecorators.name: matchOrders
functionDecorators.description: Match two complementary orders that have a profitable spread. Each order is filled at their respective price point. However, the calculations are carried out as though the orders are both being filled at the right order's price point. The profit made by the left order goes to the taker (who matched the two orders).

parameterDecorators.name: leftOrder
parameterDecorators.description: First order to match.

parameterDecorators.name: rightOrder
parameterDecorators.description: Second order to match.

parameterDecorators.name: leftSignature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that order was created by the left maker.

parameterDecorators.name: rightSignature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that order was created by the right maker.

returnDecorators.name: matchedFillResults
returnDecorators.description: Amounts filled and fees paid by maker and taker of matched orders.

functionDecorators.name: matchOrdersWithMaximalFill
functionDecorators.description: Match two complementary orders that have a profitable spread. Each order is maximally filled at their respective price point, and the matcher receives a profit denominated in either the left maker asset, right maker asset, or a combination of both.

parameterDecorators.name: leftOrder
parameterDecorators.description: First order to match.

parameterDecorators.name: rightOrder
parameterDecorators.description: Second order to match.

parameterDecorators.name: leftSignature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that order was created by the left maker.

parameterDecorators.name: rightSignature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that order was created by the right maker.

returnDecorators.name: matchedFillResults
returnDecorators.description: Amounts filled by maker and taker of matched orders.

functionDecorators.name: preSign
functionDecorators.description: Approves a hash on-chain. After presigning a hash, the preSign signature type will become valid for that hash and signer.

parameterDecorators.name: hash
parameterDecorators.description: Any 32-byte hash.

functionDecorators.name: registerAssetProxy
functionDecorators.description: Registers an asset proxy to its asset proxy id. Once an asset proxy is registered, it cannot be unregistered.

parameterDecorators.name: assetProxy
parameterDecorators.description: Address of new asset proxy to register.

functionDecorators.name: setSignatureValidatorApproval
functionDecorators.description: Approves/unnapproves a Validator contract to verify signatures on signer's behalf using the `Validator` signature type.

parameterDecorators.name: validatorAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of Validator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: approval
parameterDecorators.description: Approval or disapproval of Validator contract.

functionDecorators.name: simulateDispatchTransferFromCalls
functionDecorators.description: This function may be used to simulate any amount of transfers As they would occur through the Exchange contract. Note that this function will always revert, even if all transfers are successful. However, it may be used with eth_call or with a try/catch pattern in order to simulate the results of the transfers. This function does not return a value. However, it will always revert with `Error("TRANSFERS_SUCCESSFUL")` if all of the transfers were successful.

parameterDecorators.name: assetData
parameterDecorators.description: Array of asset details, each encoded per the AssetProxy contract specification.

parameterDecorators.name: fromAddresses
parameterDecorators.description: Array containing the `from` addresses that correspond with each transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: toAddresses
parameterDecorators.description: Array containing the `to` addresses that correspond with each transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: amounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array containing the amounts that correspond to each transfer.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Change the owner of this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: New owner address.
